description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5pmc","text":"The LungMAP program has been working for over a decade to provide the lung community with a comprehensive resource for the lung research community, including reference data sets and protocols [1]. The University of Rochester has served as the Human Tissue Core and worked extensively with Research Center lab groups. We have established protocols for procuring human tissue including, but not limited to lung, and processing them for a variety of downstream analysis modalities including the generation of single cell suspensions [2, 3, 4]. We have successfully utilized singe cells suspensions to generate single cell CITESeq data utilizing the 10X Genomics Single Cell 3' (v3.1) RNA sequencing platform [5-7]. This protocol describes the steps necessary for preparing generating sequencing data following staining single cells with ADT-tagged antibodies (including library preparation, sequencing steps, and mapping {"blocks":[{"key":"4caho","text":"Aliquot 22.5 uL of each sample (ADT cDNA) to a new, labeled 0.5-mL strip tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7lhas","text":"Add 25 uL of 2X Q5 HotStart HiFi Master Mix to each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6bapd","text":"Add 2.5 uL of appropriate indexed primer-pair (10uM each primer) to each sample. Mix by pipetting and spin briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bk0ve","text":" Step  Temperature    Time    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20rl3","text":"1          95°C                Hold    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f086t","text":"2          95°C                3:00     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"effr1","text":"3          95°C                0:20     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3eg2b","text":"4          60°C                0:30     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjv6f","text":"5          72°C                0:20     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lbmm","text":"6          Complete 12 cycles                                    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2c6t6","text":"7          72°C                5:00     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ck7g","text":"8          4°C                  Hold    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8pfp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqtkl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqcaa","text":"Add 60 ul AMPure beads (1.2X ratio) to each sample and pipette to mix 10X","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2rv6l","text":"Incubate 5 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fasvu","text":"Place tube on magnet and wait 1 minute until solution is clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4jpri","text":"Carefully remove and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekfjg","text":"Add 200 μl 80% Ethanol to the tube without disturbing the pellet and stand for 30 seconds (first Ethanol wash).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7upbb","text":"Carefully remove and discard the ethanol wash.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4entk","text":"Add 200 μl 80% Ethanol to the tube without disturbing the pellet and stand for 30 seconds (second Ethanol wash).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3eh03","text":"Carefully remove and discard the ethanol wash.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9s3vv","text":"Centrifuge tube briefly and return it to magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lbeb","text":"Remove and discard any remaining ethanol and allow the beads to air dry for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"95uam","text":"Resuspend beads in 32 μl EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rn3v","text":"Pipette mix vigorously and incubate at room temperature for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"codj1","text":"Place tube on magnet and transfer 30 uL supernatant to low-bind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fecer","text":"Quantify library by standard methods (Qubit \u0026 BioAnalyzer). ADT library will be around 210 bp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csq22","text":"Create a feature reference file corresponding to 
the antibody panel and library mapping file corresponding to the file 
paths for the ADT and GEX libraries. Run cellranger count, incorporating
 both of these files and the combined Human+COVID reference","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3a77d","text":"Create fastq from bcl files using cellranger mkfastq with default parameters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4kin5","text":"Insert 10X provided well indices into Clarity LIMS generated sample sheet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9iu5o","text":"Create combined human and COVID reference by downloading the Human 2020-A reference from https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/software/cell-ranger/latest/release-notes/cr-reference-release-notes#2020-a. Download the full COVID sequence from https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/nuccore/MT547814. Append the COVID fasta onto the human genome fasta. Create a record within the human GTF file corresponding to the full COVID sequence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":89,"length":111},{"key":1,"offset":240,"length":45}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1ADECAEA240011EF92520A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/software/cell-ranger/latest/release-notes/cr-reference-release-notes#2020-a"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1ADECAEA240011EF92520A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/nuccore/MT547814"}}}}
